spec: iOS + Android + PWA: 1024x1024 master, plus exports or allow us to generate from master.
Clean vector logo for crisp scaling on desktop/mobile/tablet.
1200x630 image for link previews.
CSV mapping video_id -> preferred thumbnail URL or timecode/frame note. This lets us guarantee: move visible, face/muscle visible, no motion blur.
Optional: provide WAV/MP3 beeps if you want brand-specific sound instead of oscillator tones.
Per-tenant logo (min 512px wide, transparent PNG preferred) + optional hero graphic.
For each move: tags (upper/lower/abs/cardio etc), equipment, impact, difficulty. Minimal set is fine to start.
Image/video to represent business product on /for-gyms/ (can be mockup).
MP4, 6–12s loop, muted, 16:9 (desktop) + 9:16 (mobile). Peloton-style category hero loop.
